db_agent.name: Database Agent
db_agent.description: Handles TimescaleDB data ingestion and schema management

spark_agent.name: Spark Processing Agent
spark_agent.description: Manages Apache Spark / PySpark data processing and aggregation

webapp_agent.name: WebApp Agent
webapp_agent.description: Develops Flask API and React dashboard

orchestrator.name: Master Orchestrator
orchestrator.description: Coordinates all agents and manages workflow
